body: So yea tell me what you thought of E3. I do have to say I was so pumped when I say the Master Chief Collection, But when I saw the new COD game I thought omg this is a copy of titianfall and halo mixed. Also the name Advanced Wafare. Hmmmmm anything orginal?World at War, Modern Warfare,Advanced Warfare. Meh god.

title: E3 Topic!
